t: LFS Glove - Products, Competitors, Financials, Employees, Headquarters Locations
s: LFS Glove is a division of LFS Inc., a Bellingham, WA-based marine, industrial, recreational, and commercial fishing gear supplier. LFS Glove is the exclusive importer and distributor of Bellingham® gloves and other respected name brands.

t: Amazon
s: Great waterproof gloves for work outdoors. I have no less than 4 pair around the property. Great for keeping your hands dry and warm in all weather. Buy them a size bigger so that you can get them off easier. I’ve experienced the finger liners pulling out if they are too snug on your fingers ...
